text: tumhaaree un qasamon par allaah tumhen nahin pakadata jo yoon hee asaavadhaanee se zabaan se nikal jaatee hai. parantu jo tumane pakkee qasamen khaee hon, unapar vah tumhen pakadega. to isaka praayashchit das muhataajon ko ausat darjen ka khaana khila dena hai, jo tum apane baal-bachchon ko khilaate ho ya phir unhen kapade pahanaana ya ek gulaam aazaad karana hoga. aur jise isakee saamarthy na ho, to use teen din ke roze rakhane honge. yah tumhaaree qasamon ka praayashchit hai, jabaki tum qasam kha baitho. tum apanee qasamon kee hifaajat kiya karo. is prakaar allaah apanee aayaten tumhaare saamane khol-kholakar bayaan karata hai, taaki tum krtagyata dikhalao
